2018.author: Mariusz Błaszczak
2018.position: Minister of the Interior and Administration
2018.quote: The policy of multiculturalism in Western Europe is bringing about a bloody harvest in the form of terrorist attacks
2018.quote_spanish: La política de multiculturalismo en Europa Occidental está dando una cosecha sangrienta en forma de ataques terroristas

2018.author: Jaroslaw Kaczynski
2018.position: Leader of Law and Justice party (PIS)
2018.position_spanish: Lider del partido Ley y Jusitica (PIS)
2018.quote: But that doesn't mean we should repeat the mistakes of the West and become infected with social diseases that dominate there
2018.quote_spanish: Pero eso no significa que debamos repetir los errores de Occidente y contagiarnos de las enfermedades sociales que allí dominan

2020.author: Małgorzata Kidawa-Błońska
2020.position_spanish: Candidata presidencial de la Plataforma Cívica (PO)
2020.quote: Stop migrants and secure its borders
2020.quote_spanish: 'Paren a los imigrantes' y 'aseguren las fronteras'

2020.author: Zbigniew Ziobro
2020.quote: We defended our sovereignty against the foreign culture of Islam that was being imposed on us'
2020.quote_spanish: Defendimos nuestra soberanía contra la cultura extranjera del Islam que se nos imponía'

2021.author: Robert Winnicki
2021.quote: Stop illegal immigration, stop the flooding of Europe with a wave from the whole world, stop false humanitarianism
2021.quote_spanish: Detengan la inmigración ilegal, detengan la inundación de Europa con una ola de personas de todo el mundo, detengan el falso humanitarismo

2023.author: Donald Tusk
2023.position: President of the European Council, leader of Civic Platform (PO)
2023.position_spanish: Presidente del Consejo Europeo, líder de la Plataforma Cívica (PO)
2023.quote: Poles must regain control of their country and its borders!
2023.quote_spanish: ¡Los polacos deben recuperar el control de su país y sus fronteras!

2023.author: Donald Tusk
2023.position: President of the European Council, leader of Civic Platform (PO)
2023.position_spanish: Presidente del Consejo Europeo, líder de la Plataforma Cívica (PO)
2023.quote: This danger is really lurking from around the corner. Poles must regain control of their country and its borders
2023.quote_spanish: Este peligro realmente acecha a la vuelta de la esquina. Los polacos deben recuperar el control de su país y sus fronteras
